short_summary: **Set aside for Indigenous suppliers  -  All eligible and pre-qualified suppliers have already been invited to tender**
description: Geomatics Services, within the Information Management Branch of the Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC), requires a professional services contract to support the maintenance and evolution of its Geospatial Data Infrastructure.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Notice Title:** Geomatics Technical Services for Indigenous Services Canada's Geospatial Data Infrastructure

**Tender ID:** cb-446-85800876 (Amendment 2)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Description:**
Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking a professional services contract to support the maintenance and evolution of its Geospatial Data Infrastructure. The successful contractor will provide senior technical expertise to ensure the maintenance and development of a scalable, robust, and well-supported enterprise geospatial data infrastructure.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Project management to maintain and develop the geospatial data infrastructure
* Capacity analysis, design, and upgrade of the desktop-based and server-based geomatics system software
* Installation and configuration of new releases from ESRI and Oracle
* Geographic data architecture and web development

**Required Skills:**
The contractor must have experience and technical expertise in six (6) resource categories:

* GIS Web Mapping Developer (G.10, level 2)
* GIS System Architect (G.9, level 3)
* GIS Project Manager (G.8, level 3)
* GIS Data Architect (G.5, level 2)
* GIS Application Architect (G.4, level 3)
* System Administrator (I.9, level 2)

**Tender Details:**

* Tender closing date: 2023-11-08T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-01-01
* Expected contract end date: 2027-12-31

**Contracting Entity:**

* Indigenous Services Canada
* Address: 25 rue Eddy, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H4
* Telephone: (873) 355-2439
* Email: [bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca)

**Important:**
This tender is set aside for Indigenous suppliers only. All eligible and pre-qualified suppliers have already been invited to submit their proposals.

Please note that the rewritten entry has been condensed to fit within the 400-word limit while still maintaining the essential information and details.  markdown formatting has been used to make it more readable.  The content has been rephrased to be more professional and concise.  All relevant information has been included,
